name: The many adventures of Lye
description:
Trouble has come to the land! Lye’s friend has gone missing! Now it’s up to Lye to find him. 

You control Lye throughout this Adventure, but you won’t do it in order. The game switches between different levels at random. The dice at the top of the screen shows when it switches. So stay alert! 

Controls:

Space - Jump/Start

A - Go Left

D - Go Right

This game was made for the 2022 Game Makers Tool Kit game jam
